metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Oil for frying • Instructions : o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden. o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. Add tomato sauce and simmer for 20 minutes. Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella.
